title: Bug 23787 - [Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields
description: On the Integration build 09/17, when opening the Project Properties dialog and navigating to the Info page, it is observed that the page uses text fields which causes a visual issue on all motif platforms.
OB: When opening the Project Properties dialog and navigating to the Info page on the Integration build 09/17, it is observed that the page uses text fields.
EB: The Project Properties Info page should not use text fields and should be displayed correctly on all motif platforms in the Integration build.
SR: To reproduce the issue, select a Project, right-click and choose Properties. On the subsequent Info page, observe the readonly fields (e.g., Path, Type, etc.) which are displayed as text fields.
